input.sentences: we decided to go on a very scenic and beautiful journey through the land .
we took photos of many pretty wild flowers among the grass .
finding a place to view the river | we relaxed there and took more photos .
under a stone archway | the view was even more beautiful .
at the end of the day | we found stumbled upon a waterfall and admired it from afar .
output.sentences: There is much wilderness and pretty flowers.
The view of the river is amazing.
That stone arch has the best view.
